raw_body: Former Patron of Sydney Branch of St. Benedict’s College, Colombo Old Boys Association, born on 12th March 1931 and passed away peacefully on 12th March 2024 in Sydney, NSW, Australia. Precious youngest son of the late Athanasius and Catherine Pathinather, son-in-law of late Cyril and Gertrude Edirimanasinghe, beloved husband of Merlyn (nee Edirimanasinghe), devoted father of Devika (Good Shepherd Convent, Colombo 13), Roshan and Yohan (both of S
